## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G20990](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G20990)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>B73, CHL6, CNX, CNX1, SIR4</u>
- **Gene Name:** CHLORATE RESISTANT 6, CO-FACTOR FOR NITRATE REDUCTASE AND XANTHINE DEHYDROGENASE, CO-FACTOR FOR NITRATE REDUCTASE AND XANTHINE DEHYDROGENASE 1, SIRTINOL 4
- **Description:**   molybdopterin biosynthesis CNX1 protein / molybdenum cofactor biosynthesis enzyme CNX1 (CNX1);(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2147157
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [CS203]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;chlorate resistant due to reduced nitrate reductase activity, about 10 percent of the wild-type level; reduced levels of the nitrate reductase cofactor molybenum-pterin (Mo Co); poor growth on nitrate medium.
